name: Slack
description: Slack workspace integration. Search messages, access channels, read threads, and stay connected with your team's communications while coding. Find relevant discussions and context quickly.
longDescription: Connects to Slack's hosted MCP endpoint via SSE at `mcp.slack.com`. Search messages, read channel history and threads, and find relevant discussions for development context without switching to the Slack app. No local server to install -- authenticates through Slack's OAuth flow.
